title: Understanding GAD Symptoms
text: Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) is characterized by persistent and excessive worry about various aspects of life. It often includes physical symptoms.

title: Physical Symptoms of GAD
text: People with GAD may experience physical symptoms such as fatigue, muscle tension, and restlessness.

hintAnswer: persistent worry, restlessness, and physical symptoms like fatigue and muscle tension
title: Identifying Key Symptoms
text: Which of the following is a common symptom of GAD?
choices: persistent and excessive worry about everyday events and activities
persistent worry, restlessness, and physical symptoms like fatigue and muscle tension
anxiety reaction to stress that results in a panic attack
